name: 25 things
description:
This game is a prototype of my first game, which I am currently working on. This is a mini-game with only the zombie shooting part.

In the future, I plan to release a full-fledged survival horror game with a story under a different title. (I'm aiming for a game similar to ResidentEvil2 Remake)

If you are interested in a survival horror game set in a Japanese high school, please keep an eye on this project and see where it goes.

Please support me on Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/corocom

(I will be releasing a patreon-only version of this mini-game in early 2022)
